item.title: About Me
item.description: PhD student at the University of Western Australia. Focusing on a mixture of cheminformatics, theoretical chemistry and crystal engineering. I’m involved in a few interesting software projects, some of which are: SBF Tonto Crystal Explorer Learn more and contribute to the open source stuff on GitHub. Thanks for reading!
